entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Monday 1 May 2023
